document_data.name: Horix Zoar
document_data.mainbody: '''Horix Zoar''' was a windbag member of the [[Council of Elders (Everlund)|Council of Elders]] of [[Everlund]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Horix was a member of the [[Zoar]] family and the commander of the Everlund army.
